duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer daily medications, record dosages, and observe residents, reporting changes in their condition.
Collect samples for analysis and ensure routine inspection and cleaning of equipment.
Coordinate with nurses to assist with resident care and medications, and respond to emergency calls.
Protect confidential client information and seek guidance from the nurse as needed.
Uphold federal, state, and agency regulations to protect health and safety standards.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or relevant qualification. Must be a certified medication aide. Minimum of 1 year experience as a medication aide. CPR/First Aid Certification desired (unless required by the State). Previous experience in long-term care preferred.
